title: Drilling Fluids & Hole Conditioning - AI Probing Questions

questions.question: Barite inventory shows 200 tonnes - is this sufficient for a worst-case weight-up scenario?
What's your ECD margin to fracture gradient? The programme shows only 0.3 ppg - is this adequate?
If you lose returns completely, what's your maximum volume before converting to LCM cure?
questions.expectedResponse: Defined loss thresholds and response triggers

questions.question: Your inhibition plan uses KCl - have environmental discharge permits been confirmed?
Hole cleaning model shows marginal transport at planned flow rates - what's your contingency?
questions.expectedResponse: Alternative approach or increased flow rates

questions.question: LCM pill is 50 bbls at 30 ppb - how long to mix this if losses occur unexpectedly?
Your mud cooler capacity is 50°C reduction - bottom hole temperature is 180°C. Is this sufficient?
Centrifuge is planned for continuous operation but only one unit on board - what's your backup?
The programme shows OBM but offset wells had severe losses with OBM - have you considered WBM for problem zones?
Sweep volume is 30 bbls every 6 hours - is this adequate for a 12-1/4" hole at 60° inclination?
Your resupply schedule shows barite arriving 3 days after spud - what if you need emergency weight-up on day 1?
Shaker screens are API 140 - is this suitable for the expected formation and solids loading?
